comments: Washington (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Goodwin's (CLE) path and absorbs the marginal side to side contact on the screen.
During the screen, Washington (CHA) and Allen (CLE) mutually engage and disengage and the contact is marginal.
Okoro (CLE) establishes himself in a screening position in Washington's (CHA) path and absorbs the marginal contact during the screen.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) legally contests Goodwin's (CLE) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Washington (CHA) and Allen (CLE) engage and disengage and marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Mobley (CLE) maintains a legal guarding position alongside of and absorbs the contact from Bridges (CHA) during the drive.
Wade (CLE) legally contests Washington's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Bridges (CHA) makes clean ball contact to deflect the pass away from Mobley (CLE) on the alley-oop dunk attempt. Any follow-through contact after the deflection is deemed incidental.
Rozier (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Mobley's (CLE) path and absorbs the contact on the pick.
Mobley (CLE) maintains a legal guarding position on Rozier (CHA) during the drive.
Washington (CHA) briefly places a resting hand on Allen's (CLE) side and marginal contact occurs as he slides it off during the inbound.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) momentarily rests a hand on Love's (CLE) back and marginal contact occurs during his play at the basket.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Goodwin's (CLE) path and absorbs the contact during the pick.
Hayward (CHA) hooks Okoro's (CLE) arm and Okoro responds by pulling Hayward during the rebound.  The initial illegal contact by Hayward should have been whistled as a loose ball foul.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) removes his resting hand from Goodwin's (CLE) side at the end of the drive and the contact before he starts his shooting motion is marginal.
Bridges (CHA) and Allen (CLE) both make clean ball contact as they try and secure the rebound.

Replay review of the foul called on Rozier (CHA) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Rozier (CHA) reaches in and makes contact with Love's (CLE) arm and Love is awarded two free throws.  The replay outcome is incorrect, as Rozier makes contact to Love's arm prior to his shooting motion and a non-shooting foul should have been assessed.
Bridges (CHA) grabs and pulls Allen's (CLE) extended arm to draw contact during the throw-in and the contact is marginal as the inbound pass goes off of the rim.
